Interface Functions

public interface Functions
The `Functions` interface provides static methods for manipulating and analyzing XML data, converting XML to JSON, compressing and decompressing data, drawing social network graphs, performing network analysis, and conducting search operations on the data.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static String[]
    check(String[] s)
    Checks the validity of XML data provided as an array of strings.
    static String[]
    compress(String[] s)
    Compresses the provided XML data using byte pair encoding.

    decompress(String[] s)
    Decompresses the provided compressed XML data.

    draw(String[] s)
    Draws a social network graph from the provided XML data.
    static String[]
    format(String[] s)
    Formats the XML data provided as an array of strings for better readability.

    minify(String[] s)
    Minifies the provided XML data by reducing unnecessary whitespace.

    mutualFollowers(String[] s, int[] id)
    Finds mutual followers between two users based on the social network data.

    Analyzes the social network data and returns insights about the most influential and most active users.

  • Method Details

    • check

      static String[] check(String[] s)
      Checks the validity of XML data provided as an array of strings.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing XML data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the results of the check operation.

    • repair

      static String[] repair(String[] s)
      Repairs the XML data provided as an array of strings.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing XML data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the repaired XML data.

    • format

      static String[] format(String[] s)
      Formats the XML data provided as an array of strings for better readability.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing XML data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the formatted XML data.

    • xmltoJson

      static String[] xmltoJson(String[] inputxml)
      Converts an array of XML strings to a formatted JSON string array.
      Parameters:
      inputxml - The array of XML strings.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the JSON representation of the XML data.

    • minify

      static String[] minify(String[] s)
      Minifies the provided XML data by reducing unnecessary whitespace.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing XML data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the minified XML data.

    • compress

      static String[] compress(String[] s)
      Compresses the provided XML data using byte pair encoding.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing XML data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the compressed XML data.

    • decompress

      static String[] decompress(String[] s)
      Decompresses the provided compressed XML data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array containing the compressed data (pairs and encoded data).
      Returns:
      A string array containing the decompressed XML data.

    • draw

      static com.xml.editor.SocialNetworkGraph draw(String[] s)
      Draws a social network graph from the provided XML data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the XML data.
      Returns:
      A `SocialNetworkGraph` object representing the social network graph.

    • networkAnalysis

      static String[] networkAnalysis(String[] s)
      Analyzes the social network data and returns insights about the most influential and most active users.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the social network data.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the analysis results.

    • suggest

      static String[] suggest(String[] s, int id)
      Suggests friends for a given user based on the social network data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the social network data.
      id - The user ID for whom the friends should be suggested.
      Returns:
      A string array containing suggested friends.

    • mutualFollowers

      static String[] mutualFollowers(String[] s, int[] id)
      Finds mutual followers between two users based on the social network data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the social network data.
      id - The array of user IDs for which mutual followers are to be found.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the mutual followers.

    • wordSearch

      static String[] wordSearch(String[] s, String word)
      Searches for a word in the social network data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the social network data.
      word - The word to search for.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the search results.

    • topicSearch

      static String[] topicSearch(String[] s, String topic)
      Searches for a topic in the social network data.
      Parameters:
      s - The array of strings representing the social network data.
      topic - The topic to search for.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the topic search results.
